OOC:
You are quite right, of course. I'm trying to reply to too much. I 
shall not post so much so others can post as well. Thank you for 
pointing out my rpg flaw. I appreciate it. 
Any suggestions on playing better is always appreciated. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Speaking of Moding shadowess, your posting rate could
> also be considered moding considering it denies
> players on the other side of the world like myself a
> fair chance of reply, and to be brutally honest- it's
> really starting to piss me off. True that you're not
> the only offender of this, but you're one of the worst
> if not the worst- I'm starting to lose track of the
> number of times I haven't had a fair crack at repling
> at because the situation has been moved too far
> forward for a fair reply. Could you please be more
> considerate of other players in the future?
> 
>  --- robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote: >
> OOC- Sorry!  I refrain from doing that again.
> > 
> > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...>
> > wrote:OOC::
> > Hey Malice, what the moding.  How can she transform
> > into beast mode 
> > and carry an electromagnet?  no wolf can carry
> > something like that. 
> > So please, just make sure you don't make my char do
> > too much without 
> > my say so. OK, thanks bro.
> > 
> > IC:  
> > Wolfblade:
> > She followed Malice as best as she could.  Once she
> > reached the base, 
> > she heard the intruder alarm and transformed into
> > wolf mode and ran 
> > to were the alarm was sounding. 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley
> > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Malice rummaged through some other compartments
> > and found an energy 
> > storage unit.
> > > "I can absorb and refine enough energon and put it
> > in here."
> > > He took the generator and energon storage and
> > placed them in spare 
> > part compartments on his person.  He motioned for he
> > to get out.  he 
> > followed and re- armed his traps.  The duo returne
> > to beast mode and 
> > returned to the base.  A megacycle later, they
> > returned to hear about 
> > a Predacon intruder.  They transformed and rushed
> > inside.
